title: Abuse row: PM Modi’s emotional outburst against RJD & Congress - 'what did my mother do?'
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi responded strongly to alleged abuses against his late mother during a Congress-RJD rally in Bihar, stating it insulted all women. He expressed that the people of Bihar shared his pain and condemned the remarks. Bihar Chief Minister Nitish Kumar also criticized the incident, calling the language used against PM Modi and his mother "utterly deplorable."

title: Discount grows: Russian crude gets even cheaper for India; New Delhi continues to resist US pressure
content: India is facing increased pressure from the US over its growing Russian oil imports, leading to a 50% tariff imposed by the Trump administration. Despite widening discounts on Russian Urals crude, making it cheaper than US alternatives, the US accuses India of funding Russia's war in Ukraine through these purchases.

title: 'Anti-party conduct': BRS suspends K Kavitha - what party said
content: Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) suspended MLC K Kavitha, daughter of KCR, following her public criticism of senior leaders. Kavitha accused T. Harish Rao and J. Santosh Kumar of corruption and tarnishing KCR's image, particularly concerning the Kaleshwaram irrigation project. She alleged their involvement in misdeeds that have defamed her father.

title: 2020 Delhi riots case: HC rejects bail pleas of Sharjeel Imam, Umar Khalid, 7 others
content: The Delhi High Court has dismissed the bail pleas of Sharjeel Imam, Umar Khalid, and seven others in connection with the 2020 Delhi riots larger conspiracy case. The prosecution argued the violence was a planned conspiracy to defame India, not spontaneous riots.

title: Youngest woman billionaire on leaving college: Parents reaction; money lessons
content: Lucy Guo, the world's youngest self-made billionaire, attributes her early entrepreneurial spirit to her frugal upbringing. Despite her parents' emphasis on academics, she dropped out of Carnegie Mellon to pursue the Thiel Fellowship. Guo's childhood hustles, from selling Pokémon cards to creating online gaming tools, laid the foundation for her success with companies like Scale AI and Passes.

title: Exclusive | 'I tried to live as a man but': First-ever trans chess player to reach WIM
content: Yosha Iglesias, 37, made history as the first transgender chess player to earn the WIM title and win the French women’s championship. From battling depression, financial struggles, and online hate to embracing her identity in 2020, her journey reflects resilience.

title: Yamuna threatens Delhi: Floodwaters enter homes; traffic advisory issued
content: The Yamuna River in Delhi has breached the danger mark due to continuous heavy rainfall, leading to waterlogging and flooding in areas like Mayur Vihar. Authorities have closed the Old Iron Bridge and are conducting rescue operations in Burari, evacuating stranded farmers. Shopkeepers in Civil Lines are taking precautions due to rising water levels.

title: 'Put it in container': Pak defence minister’s solution for floods; calls excess water 'blessing'
content: Pakistan's defence minister Khawaja Asif suggested citizens store floodwater as a blessing amid severe flooding in Punjab province, which has claimed 33 lives and displaced over 700,000 residents. Punjab is experiencing its biggest flood in history, impacting two million people and threatening food security due to crop damage. Monsoon rains have been excessive, leading to widespread devastation across the country.

title: Apple & Samsung to Xiaomi: Stop using our phones; 'Cease and Desist' notice sent
content: Apple and Samsung have reportedly taken legal action against Xiaomi in India over advertisements that allegedly disparaged their products. The ads compared Xiaomi phones and TVs to those of Apple and Samsung, questioning their value and technology.

title: 'I want my …': Taylor's interview leaves fans convinced she manifested future with Kelce
content: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's engagement has fans revisiting a 2012 interview where Swift detailed her vision of love and marriage. Her past words about prioritizing mutual dreams and open communication resonate deeply with her current relationship. Fans are celebrating how her teenage ideals seem to be aligning with her real-life romance with the Kansas City Chiefs star.

title: 'Head of anaconda': Ashwin hits out at Lalit Modi over Harbhajan-Sreesanth slapgate video
content: Ravichandran Ashwin has criticized Lalit Modi and Michael Clarke for circulating an old video of the 2008 IPL 'slapgate' incident involving Harbhajan Singh and S. Sreesanth. Ashwin emphasized the importance of moving on from past mistakes, noting that Harbhajan and Sreesanth have already reconciled. The resurfaced footage has been widely condemned, including by Sreesanth's wife, for reigniting a settled controversy.

title: US Open: Naomi Osaka turns pain into power, fashion into flair at Flushing Meadows
content: Naomi Osaka has lit up the US Open with both style and substance, dazzling in crystal-studded outfits and her quirky “labubus” plush toys while storming into her first Grand Slam quarter-final in over four years. Defeating Coco Gauff in straight sets, the four-time major champion has embraced motherhood, mental health battles, and a joyful comeback on her beloved Arthur Ashe Stadium.

title: Bombay HC to Cognizant: You cannot use your logo in India until …
content: The Bombay High Court has reinstated a ban on Cognizant's use of its logo in India, pending the resolution of a trademark infringement lawsuit filed by Atyati Technologies. This decision overturns a previous order that had allowed Cognizant to continue using the logo.

title: 'One-sided' trade myth: Why Donald Trump is wrong - How US profits big from India
content: Donald Trump's claims of a disastrous trade relationship with India are challenged by a GTRI analysis, revealing a $35-40 billion surplus for the US when considering all earnings. The US benefits significantly from tech, finance, and education sectors in India. India's proposed tariff concessions are generous, and its decisions on oil and defence are based on national interests.

title: PM Modi rides Xi’s favourite Hongqi during China visit: Here’s what makes it special
content: The Hongqi L5 draws power from a massive 6.0-litre V12, delivering more than 400 hp. Despite its size, the car manages a 0–100 km/h sprint in around 8.5 seconds and tops out at nearly 210 km/h.NAt over 5.5 metres long and weighing upward of three tonnes

title: Jitesh Sharma Exclusive: A small-town boy, who keeps and is blooming in finisher's role
content: Jitesh Sharma scored only 261 runs in Royal Challengers Bengaluru's (RCB) title-winning season, but it was not the runs that caught the selectors’ eyes, it was his 176.35 strike rate while batting at 6 and 7. Jitesh, who never had a coach, learnt cricket by watching YouTube videos of his childhood heroes Adam Gilchrist and Sourav Ganguly. Making a comeback into the Indian team at the age of 31 is as breathtaking as his cricketing sojourn.

title: Gurgaon to 'Gurujam': Traffic snarls, broken roads; 10 viral videos capture rain chaos
content: Gurgaon faced chaos on Monday. Heavy rainfall caused roads to submerge. Vehicles stalled, leading to severe traffic jams. Key areas like IFFCO Chowk and Hero Honda Chowk were heavily affected. Commuters experienced hours-long delays. Emergency services struggled to navigate the flooded streets. The city's drainage issues were highlighted once again. Residents are demanding better infrastructure.

title: ‘If you arrest us ...': Jarange warns Fadnavis govt; vows to stay till demands met
content: Maratha quota activist Manoj Jarange has warned of intensified protests in Mumbai, with more Marathas expected to arrive over the weekend. Jarange cautioned authorities against arrests or lathi charges, threatening severe consequences. Mumbai Police rejected a renewed request for agitation at Azad Maidan, citing violations and court directives.

title: Semicon India 2025: PM Modi receives first made-in-India chip 'Vikram'
content: Prime Minister Modi received India's first indigenous semiconductor chip, the Vikram processor, at Semicon India 2025. Union IT Minister Vaishnaw highlighted the rapid progress driven by the India Semiconductor Mission, with five units under construction and significant investment committed. Industry leaders praised India's growing role and potential in the global semiconductor market, projecting substantial growth and collaboration.

title: 'They have caused an issue by bringing Gill into T20': Ex India star drops bombshell
content: Robin Uthappa suggests Shubman Gill's selection for the T20I Asia Cup and his vice-captaincy might be influenced by star power and marketing considerations, despite his recent strong Test performance. Uthappa believes that India has a history of backing superstars, and Gill's inclusion aligns with this trend, especially after a successful IPL 2025 season.

title: Rape case: AAP MLA Harmeet Singh Pathanmajra arrested; flees after firing at police
content: Aam Aadmi Party MLA Harmeet Singh Pathanmajra was arrested by Patiala police in connection with a rape case, sparking political turmoil. Pathanmajra claims the arrest is retaliation for criticizing the party's Delhi leadership, alleging they are undermining Punjab leaders and ignoring local issues. He urged supporters to protest, accusing the Delhi leadership of remote-controlling Punjab and punishing dissent.

title: Despite 'economic selfishness': PM Modi hails India's 7.8% GDP growth; takes veiled dig at Trump
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi highlighted India's impressive 7.8% GDP growth, achieved amidst global economic concerns fueled by what he termed "economic selfishness," a likely reference to US trade policies. This statement comes after the US imposed significant tariffs on Indian exports and targeted India's Russian oil purchases, escalating trade tensions between the two nations.

title: Bahrain to open Hajj registration tomorrow: Key details
content: Bahrain will open online registration for the 1447 AH (2026) Hajj season on September 3 via official Hajj platform closing on September 16. Applicants must register through the eKey system, hold a valid ID, and may include four companions. Accepted pilgrims can select campaigns from September 16 and pay BD 150. Health and ID verification are mandatory.

title: 'Designed & made in India': PM Modi on chip mission at Semicon 2025 - top quotes
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi inaugurated Semicon India 2025, emphasizing India's ambition to become a semiconductor hub. He received the first made-in-India Vikram 32-bit processor and highlighted the nation's commitment through reforms and investments. Modi envisions India as a key player, designing, manufacturing, and exporting trusted semiconductors globally, driving significant change and economic growth.

title: 'Proposed visit of a VVIP': Is PM Modi heading to violence-hit Manipur on Sept 13? What we know
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to visit Mizoram and Manipur on September 13, as officials said, marking his first visit to Manipur since ethnic tensions escalated in May 2023. In Mizoram, he is expected to inaugurate a railway line connecting Aizawl with Silchar, Assam, as part of the Act East Policy.

title: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson’s real estate empire: Inside his lavish mansions
content: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson owns many luxurious properties. His real estate includes a Beverly Hills mansion with city views. He has a Georgia farm with rustic charm. Johnson also owns a Florida villa for relaxation. These homes show his taste for luxury. The properties reflect his lifestyle and success. Each estate serves a specific purpose for his family and career.

title: “Bill Belichick was 41 when Jordon Hudson was 7”: TCU vs. North Carolina scores go viral
content: Mike Beauvais posted an X post about the age difference between Bill Belichick and Jordon Hudson during a college football game between North Carolina and TCU, but fans quickly corrected his math. The post sparked a flurry of reactions, with users pointing out the actual age gap and commenting on the relationship.

title: 'Shame': Trump trade adviser's fresh attack on India after RIC huddle at SCO; takes jibe at PM Modi
content: Peter Navarro criticized PM Modi for aligning with Putin and Xi Jinping at the SCO summit, urging India to support Europe and Ukraine and cease purchasing Russian oil. He accused India of "profiteering" from refined Russian oil sales and labeled the conflict as "Modi's war." The US has imposed tariffs on India, which New Delhi deems "unjustified."

title: Vote 'chori' row: BJP steps up attack on Congress; claims Pawan Khera has 2 voter ID cards
content: The BJP has accused Congress leader Pawan Khera of possessing two voter ID cards, prompting calls for an Election Commission investigation into potential electoral law violations. This accusation coincides with Rahul Gandhi's intensified criticism of the government, alleging "vote theft" during the recent "Voter Adhikar Yatra" in Bihar.

title: 'Threw India ties aside for Pak business': Ex-US NSA blasts Trump; calls it a 'huge strategic harm'
content: Former NSA Jake Sullivan accuses Donald Trump of prioritizing his family's business interests in Pakistan over strengthening ties with India, calling it a strategic blunder. Sullivan suggests Trump's actions, including potential Bitcoin deals and trade agreements with Pakistan, undermine US credibility and worry allies. He highlights the importance of a strong US-India relationship to counter China.

title: Delhi-NCR rains: Thousands stuck in massive Gurgaon traffic snarl; watch video
content: Gurgaon faced severe traffic disruptions on Monday due to waterlogged roads and numerous vehicle breakdowns. Commuters experienced extensive delays, particularly on the Delhi-Jaipur Expressway and key intersections. The traffic police responded to around 200 distress calls, deploying personnel and cranes to manage the chaos.

title: Gold price prediction today: Rates hit new highs - where are they headed?
content: Gold price prediction today: Gold prices are surging, driven by expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts and geopolitical uncertainties. Spot gold reached $3,475, while MCX October gold hit Rs 104,724. Analysts suggest buying on dips, anticipating a test of the all-time high at $3,500, with potential resistance at $3,650 and support at $3,450.

title: Ahmedabad school murder: Bag checks expose hidden student world; blades, vapes, booze, condoms found
content: Following a fatal stabbing at an Ahmedabad school, surprise bag checks have revealed alarming items carried by students. Schools are finding lighters, vapes, and even alcohol, alongside concerning items like blades and contraceptives. Psychologists attribute this to peer pressure and exposure to adult content, while counselors highlight the influence of violent media and easy access to addictive substances at home.

title: NASA’s first view of Earth from the Moon: A photo that changed how we see home
content: In 1966, NASA's Lunar Orbiter 1 captured the first image of Earth from the Moon. This photograph showed Earth as a fragile sphere. It changed humanity's perspective. The Lunar Orbiter program aimed to map the Moon for Apollo landings. Engineers captured the Earth image. The restored image revealed more details. This view sparked discussions about Earth's fragility.

title: Chhattisgarh rain fury: IAF airlifts man stranded for 12 hours in flooded Shabari river
content: A man was successfully rescued from the flood-swollen Shabari river near Nadigufa–Telavarti after being stranded for over 12 hours. A joint operation by the Indian Air Force, Sukma district administration, police, and CRPF was launched after strong currents hampered initial rescue attempts. Drones pinpointed the man's location, leading to an airlift operation.

title: Mitchell Starc bids farewell to T20Is; eyes long Test and ODI journey ahead
content: Mitchell Starc has retired from T20 Internationals to prioritize Test and ODI cricket, finishing as Australia's second-highest T20I wicket-taker. He aims to stay fresh for upcoming Indian Test tour, Ashes, and 2027 ODI World Cup. Australia named their squad for the T20 series against New Zealand, with Ben Dwarshuis joining the pace attack.

title: Dwayne Johnson breaks down in tears as The Smashing Machine premiere earns standing ovation
content: Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson experienced an emotional premiere of "The Smashing Machine" at the Venice Film Festival, receiving a 15-minute standing ovation. Johnson, portraying UFC legend Mark Kerr, was moved to tears alongside co-star Emily Blunt, director Benny Safdie, and Kerr himself. The film's powerful reception has sparked Oscar buzz, with Johnson acknowledging the transformative nature of the project.

title: Dwayne Johnson weight loss: ‘Secret’ behind massive transformation
content: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson surprised everyone at the Venice Film Festival with a noticeably leaner physique, sparking widespread reactions. This transformation, reportedly a 60-pound weight loss, is for his role as Mark Kerr in 'The Smashing Machine.' Johnson attributes the change to digestive health issues and a desire to authentically portray the character, dismissing Ozempic rumors.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens above 24,650; BSE Sensex up over 200 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in green on Tuesday following a strong rally the previous day. While Nifty50 was above 24,600, BSE Sensex was up over 200 points.

title: UP: Youth killed, body in Ganga; police cite relationship with friend’s sister
content: Kanpur police have solved the murder case of 22-year-old Rishikesh, whose torso was found in the Ganga. Four suspects are arrested, while four remain at large. Rishikesh was killed for having a relationship with the sister of prime suspect Pawan, who threatened him before the murder.

title: Massive landslide buries Darfur village: Over 1,000 killed; only one survivor found
content: A devastating landslide in Sudan's Darfur region has reportedly killed over 1,000 people in the village of Tarasin, according to the Sudan Liberation Movement/Army. With only one survivor found, the army-aligned governor of Darfur, Minni Minnawi, has appealed to international organizations for urgent assistance. The region remains largely inaccessible due to the ongoing civil war between the army and paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF).

title: 'Fueling Russian war machine': Bessent's 'bad actors' jibe at India, China; dubs SCO meet 'performative'
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent voiced optimism about resolving trade tensions with India, saying, “two great countries will get this solved.” He dismissed the SCO summit as “largely performative,” despite PM Modi meeting Putin and Xi. Bessent criticized India’s Russian oil trade, while confirming Trump may impose more sanctions on Russia, stating, “everything’s on the table.”

title: Nestlé fires CEO Laurent Freixe over ‘romantic relationship’ with subordinate
content: Nestlé abruptly dismissed CEO Laurent Freixe after discovering an undisclosed romantic relationship with a subordinate, violating the company's code of conduct. Philipp Navratil, previously head of Nespresso, has been appointed as the new CEO, tasked with maintaining Nestlé's current strategy and improving efficiency. The decision follows an internal investigation and aims to uphold the company's values and governance.

title: 'War 2' box office collection day 19: Film sees drop on Monday; earns over Rs 235 crore
content: Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR's 'War 2' continues its box office run, earning Rs 235.1 crore in India by its 19th day, with Monday collections at Rs 0.60 crore. Rajinikanth’s 'Coolie', also in its third week, made Rs 1.10 crore on the same day, totaling Rs 280.20 crore.

title: Liverpool break bank for Isak; agrees to shell out £130m to bring in Newcastle striker
content: Alexander Isak has moved to Liverpool from Newcastle United for a record fee. The Swedish striker's transfer is now the most expensive in British soccer history. Isak expressed his happiness to join Liverpool. Newcastle has signed Nick Woltemade and Yoane Wissa as replacements. Liverpool's acquisition of Isak is part of their summer spending.

title: Belichick: Heels 'better than what we were tonight'
content: TCU spoiled Bill Belichick's college coaching debut by rolling past North Carolina 48-14 on Monday night.

title: Pads reliever Adam suffers ruptured quad tendon
content: All-Star reliever Jason Adam was carted off the field after getting injured in the seventh inning of the Padres' loss to the Orioles on Monday.

title: Gundy calls out Ducks' budget; Lanning fires back
content: Oklahoma State's Mike Gundy and Oregon's Dan Lanning traded barbs Monday after Gundy called attention to the Ducks' sizable budget.

title: Fictitious ending? Story fly hits glove, pole for HR
content: Boston's Trevor Story had a strange Fenway Park homer in the sixth inning against Cleveland when the ball went off an outfielder's glove and then the Pesky Pole.

title: Venus in doubles last 8, calls on Serena to show up
content: Venus Williams and Leylah Fernandez reached the women's doubles quarterfinals at the US Open, defeating the 12th-seeded duo of Ekaterina Alexandrova and Zhang Shuai 6-3, 6-4 in their third-round match Monday.

title: Gauff on Open loss: 'Not going to let this crush me'
content: After losing in the fourth round of the US Open for the second year in a row, this time to Naomi Osaka, Coco Gauff said, "I am not going to let this crush me."

title: FSU draws ACC's first $50K fine for storming field
content: Florida State became the first to be fined $50,000 by the ACC for violating the new event security policy after fans stormed the field following a win over Alabama.

title: 🏈 Fantasy football PPR rankings for Week 1
content: Weekly individual and composite rankings for each position in PPR and IDP formats, as well as Eric Karabell's superflex ranks.

title: Is this Naomi Osaka's breakthrough tournament?
content: Naomi Osaka defeated Coco Gauff at the US Open on Monday -- and looked like she was back to Grand Slam-winning form.

title: Let's preview the 2025 NFL season: Bold predictions, strengths and concerns for all 32 teams
content: Here's everything you need to know ahead of the NFL regular season, including how teams rank before Week 1.

title: Simulating the entire season: The biggest storylines from one possible outcome
content: We played out on of the Football Power Index's 10,000 season sims, from Week 1 through Super Bowl LX.

title: Connelly's Week 1 overreactions: Belichick, Arch Manning, Bama's debacle and more
content: What happened to Arch Manning? And Clemson?? And Alabama??? We jump to some way-too-early conclusions.

title: Who won and lost the transfer window? Assessing Liverpool, Arsenal, Man United, more
content: This summer transfer window broke more records, with last season's Premier League champions doing an astonishing amount of business to remain ahead of the pack. Here are our winners and losers.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: Welcome to September! Ranking the MLB playoff races that will rule the final month
content: Here's what you need to know about the battles to reach October as teams trying to lock up a postseason spot.

title: Basketball Hall of Fame: Where the 2025 class stacks up for NBA, WNBA
content: Ahead of enshrinement weekend, let's take a closer look at where this year's class ranks in both leagues.

title: One year post-shooting, San Francisco's Ricky Pearsall has grown on and off the field
content: The WR was shot in the chest a week before his rookie season, but now he's putting "a positive light" on it.

title: Solak: The Packers needed Micah Parsons -- and here's how they should use him
content: Parsons could take Green Bay's defense to another level. Let's look at how he fits into Jeff Hafley's scheme.

title: Liverpool and Arsenal look incomplete, Fulham VAR drama, Real Madrid win again, more
content: Liverpool and Arsenal wasn't a classic by any means as both teams clearly need to figure things out. "Works in progress" was a recurring theme as Marcotti recaps the weekend

title: MLS Power Rankings: Philadelphia jumps San Diego into top spot
content: Philadelphia Union's statement win over Cincinnati has the Union back on top of ESPN's MLS Power Rankings.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team postdraft
content: The draft is just the beginning. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a championship-winning manager.

title: Clay makes his NFL season forecast: Picking the best offenses, top defenses and Super Bowl winner
content: Let's project the NFL's best -- and worst -- offenses and defenses. Plus, how do all 32 teams rank overall, and who will make the Super Bowl?

title: Guide to the rookie class: Who is flying under the radar? Who will win OROY, DROY?
content: Here's everything you need to know about this group of first-years, including Rookie of the Year front-runners.

title: College football betting: Why Miami is a good bet to win the ACC
content: One bet to make after our first look at the ACC's top contenders, including Miami, Clemson and Florida State.

title: Canelo vs. Crawford: 10 big fights that define their careers
content: A look at both fighters' best performance, best KO, most dominant fight, the one where they struggled and more.

title: WWE Clash in Paris results: Rollins keeps title, holds off Uso, Punk and Knight
content: Seth Rollins retained the World Heavyweight Championship against Jey Uso, CM Punk, and LA Knight, while John Cena beat Logan Paul at WWE Clash in Paris.

title: What is the Ryder Cup? 2025 format, teams, all-time winners
content: The 45th edition of the Ryder Cup will take place in September 2025. Check out details on the dates, format, teams, all-time winners and more now.

title: Ramos, Olise join pantheon of singing soccer stars
content: It's been a wild few days in football -- not in terms of rumbling transfer sagas, VAR-related controversies or eyebrow-raising results, but in terms of a surprising amount of new music being released by active players.

title: Lee Corso's farewell to 'GameDay': Behind the scenes of a football celebration﻿
content: Fans, many without tickets to the game, came from all over the country to Columbus to get a glimpse of Corso one last time.

title: Weekly pickups: Jonah Tong, Payton Tolle lead fantasy playoff picks
content: The players you should claim off the waiver wire, including some pitchers to help you in the fantasy playoffs.

title: Pak Defence Minister's Bizarre Solution To Floods: "Store Water In Tubs"
content: Pakistan's Defence Minister Khwaja Asif has a bizarre solution to tackle Pakistan's flood situation. He wants Pakistanis living in low-lying areas to "store" the flood waters in containers, rather than letting it go to drains.

title: "6 Hours For 12 Km": Gurugram Resident Shares Traffic Horror After Rain
content: Speaking about his "nightmare" to NDTV, Shubham Gupta said he left his office in Cyber Hub around 4:30 PM and reached his home in Sector 48 around 10:15 PM.

title: Deepak Mittal, Who Led India-Taliban Talks, Appointed Ambassador To UAE
content: The Ministry of External Affairs has appointed Deepak Mittal as the next Ambassador of India to the United Arab Emirates.

title: Explained: The Vikram-32 Chip Handed Over To PM Modi At Semicon 2025
content: Union Information and Broadcasting Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw on Tuesday presented India's first indigenously developed Vikram-32-bit chip to Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the inauguration of the Semicon India 2025 conference.

title: Amid US Tariffs, BJP To Launch Swadeshi-Focused Aatmanirbhar Bharat Sankalp Abhiyan
content: BJP will launch a three-month-long 'Aatmanirbhar Bharat Sankalp Abhiyan' from September 25 to December 25, 2025, to promote PM Narendra Modi's vision of Swadeshi amid US President Donald Trump's recent tariff escalation against India.

title: Maratha Quota Row: Public Transport Buses Resume At CSMT After 4 Days Of Halt
content: The Brihanmumbai Electric Supply and Transport (BEST) Undertaking on Tuesday resumed bus operations from the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CSMT), four days after it suspended the services due to the Maratha quota agitation, an official said.

title: "Rebuke To Trump": What US Media Reported On PM Modi, Putin Meeting
content: PM Modi and Putin met for the first time after the US imposed tariffs on India and shared bonhomie with handshakes, hugs, and long talks.

title: A 70 kg Chocolate Sculpture Of PM Modi, Made By Students In Odisha
content: The sculpture incorporates symbols of key government programmes, such as Ujjwala Yojana and Jan Dhan Yojana.

title: Global Weather Office Warns Of La Nina Conditions. What It Means For India
content: La Nina may return to impact weather and climate patterns from September onwards, the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) has said in a latest update.

title: BJP Minister Slams Telangana Chief Minister's "Naxalism A Philosophy" Remark
content: Junior Union Home Minister and prominent Telangana BJP leader, Bandi Sanjay Kumar, has criticised Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy, accusing him of disrespecting the thousands of lives lost to Naxal violence.

title: Bihar Dhaba Owner Loses Bike In Rally, Gets New Pulsar From Rahul Gandhi
content: In an unexpected twist to a political roadshow, Congress leader Rahul Gandhi recently gifted a brand-new Pulsar 220 bike to a dhaba owner from Bihar's Darbhanga, whose motorcycle had disappeared during a rally.

title: Suicide Behind One In Every 100 Deaths: WHO
content: More than one in every 100 deaths globally is due to suicide, the World Health Organization said Tuesday, calling for urgent action to stem a mounting mental health crisis among young people especially.

title: "Colossal Blunder": US Expert On Trump's India Tariffs
content: Leading American international relations expert John Mearsheimer said Donald Trump's secondary tariffs on India for buying Russian oil "won't work."

title: Mexican TikTok Star, Husband, 2 Kids Found Wrapped In Plastic In Cartel-Style Execution
content: Mexican TikTok influencer Esmeralda Ferrer Garibay and her family were found dead inside a pickup truck in the San Andres

title: How Nestle CEO's Secret Affair With Junior Employee Was Exposed
content: Nestle has fired its chief executive, Laurent Freixe, after an internal investigation confirmed he breached company policy by having a secret "romantic relationship" with a junior employee.

title: "India Needs To Be With US, Not Russia": Trump Aide After PM Modi, Putin Meet
content: US President Donald Trump's trade adviser, Peter Navarro, doubled down on his criticism of India's trade ties with Russia.

title: Suntory CEO Takeshi Niinami Quits Over Japan Drugs Probe
content: One of Japan's best-known business people has resigned as CEO of beverage giant Suntory after police raided his house in an illegal drugs probe, the company and media reports said Tuesday.

title: Longest Suspension Of Vaishno Devi Yatra After Covid, More Rain Expected
content: The Vaishno Devi yatra in Jammu and Kashmir remains suspended for a week now, since a landslide hit the pilgrimage track last Tuesday, killing 35.

title: 'Have no fear ...': California governor mocks Trump; shares video of PM Modi, Putin, Xi at SCO
content: seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sift through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock . join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world . read More Bigg Boss 19: Ashnoor Kaur’s journey from TV to Tamil Cinema’s iconic villain 'Dude'

title: Mid-air scare: Suspected bird hit on IndiGo Nagpur-Kolkata flight; probe under way
content: the TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide . the team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports .

title: ‘Objectionable’ cartoons on PM Modi, RSS: SC makes absolute interim protection from arrest granted earlier to Indore cartoonist
content: The top court said the interim protection from arrest earlier granted to Indore-based cartoonist Hemant Malviya would be made “absolute” after he tendered an apology for his “objectionable” social media posts

title: Nara Lokesh opens advanced smart kitchen at Kadapa
content: The Minister also announced to take the number of smart kitchens in the district to 33 in eleven mandals by December, which will be able to provide sumptuous meal every day to 1.24 lakh children across Kadapa district

title: YS Sharmila pays tribute at YSR Samadhi on death anniversary of her father and former Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh
content: She also paid rich tributes to the families of the 700 persons who died of shock in the aftermath of the demise of their favourite leader

title: Allahabad High Court raises concern over safety of women in gyms
content: Court questions male trainers’ role, directs police to verify registration and staffing of fitness centre

title: Super Six Super Hit meet on September 10 on the outskirts of Anantapur
content: Nearly 3.5 lakh people are expected to attend the meeting with majority of them being women, Minister for Finance Payyavula Keshav said

title: Malayalam movie Lokah faces Karnataka’s ire: CCB to verify claims of Bengaluru’s portrayal as ‘hub of parties and drugs’
content: Social media users are also demanding removal of certain dialogues and scenes which “demean girls of Bengaluru”

title: Rahul Gandhi running vote theft campaign, his close aide Pawan Khera carries two voter cards: BJP
content: The BJP spokesperson also asked Mr. Gandhi if he would take any action against Mr. Khera for possessing multiple voter IDs

title: KCR suspends daughter Kavitha from BRS for ‘anti-party activities’
content: The action comes a day after Ms. Kavitha levelled serious allegations against her party colleagues and close relatives – former Irrigation Minister Harish Rao and former MP Santosh Kumar

title: DMK government crippled Cauvery-Gundar river-linking project: Palaniswami
content: Despite increased borrowings and higher revenue, no project has been implemented by ruling party, he charged

title: Kerala Governor moves Supreme Court against Kerala Chief Minister’s role in Kerala VC appointments
content: Kerala Governor Rajendra Arlekar cites UGC regulations; says rules vests authority to pick VC from search panel names to Chancellor/Governor

title: PM Modi hits out at RJD, Congress over remarks against his mother
content: Prime Minister says insult extends to women of Bihar; accuses RJD of shielding criminals during its rule

title: BDA seeks exemption from RERA provisions, cites special statute and welfare role in Bengaluru housing sector
content: The authority further argued that the BDA Act, 1976, is a special statute, while RERA is a general law applicable to the real estate sector. As per settled legal principles, a special statute prevails over a general one. Therefore, the provisions of RERA cannot override those of the BDA Act

title: When Anna University banned American beverages Pepsi, Coca-Cola from its canteen 22 years ago
content: The Lovely Professional University (LPU) in Punjab recently announced a ban on American soft drinks in the varsity campus. Way back in 2003, a state university in Tamil Nadu banished Pepsi and Coca-Cola from its canteen.

title: Watch: Denied Aadhaar, Pune tribal community can’t access schools or hospitals
content: A number of people from tribal communities across Maharashtra face barriers to accessing education, health care, and government schemes because they are not registered with the Unique Identification Authority of India

title: Umar Khalid, Sharjeel Imam bail plea hearing highlights: ‘All the appeals are dismissed,’ says Delhi High Court
content: Solicitor General Tushar Mehta, on July 9, 2025, told the Delhi High Court that those accused of acting against the nation must remain in jail until they are either convicted or acquitted

title: LoP Suvendu Adhikari asks West Bengal government to reinstate ‘untainted’ teachers’ jobs
content: ‘Untainted’ teachers welcome move by the LoP who has assured them that if the matter is debated in the Assembly they will support the cause

title: Greater Bengaluru Authority: Three-tier governance structure ushers in new era in Bengaluru
content: The Chief Minister-led GBA at the pan-city level, will for the first time bring together all parastatals on one platform along with five city corporations and ward committees.

title: Traffic suspended on Jammu-Srinagar National Highway amid incessant rains
content: The traffic on the highway, the only all-weather road linking Kashmir with rest of the country, was suspended after mudslides and shooting of stones at various places between Samroli and Banihal sector, officials said

title: Indira Canteen opened in Kalaghatagi in Dharwad district of Karnataka
content: Labour Minister and district-in-charge for Dharwad Santosh Lad called on the people to avail the benefit of getting quality food at affordable price

title: U.S. tariffs likely to hit Indian tea exports, says Indian Tea Association
content: United States tariffs on Indian tea impact exports, Indian Tea Association seeks measures to strengthen export potential

title: Case against Maratha quota protesters for assaulting passenger, vandalising BEST bus
content: Protesters gathered for the Maratha quota agitation in Mumbai allegedly manhandled a passenger and vandalised the bus at Juhu depot on August 31 evening over the issue of sharing a seat, officials said.

title: India will hold significant share in global semiconductor market, working to reduce paperwork: PM Modi
content: The Prime Minister said that the days are not far when the smallest chip made in India will drive the biggest change in the world

title: PM Modi’s visit to Manipur ‘almost confirmed’
content: The minutes of a preparatory meeting for a proposed VVIP visit in September have strengthened the possibility

title: DVAC ropes in AIADMK MLA S.P. Velumani again as accused in corporation contract irregularities case
content: Madras High Court had quashed a FIR against the former AIADMK Minister in 2022 but granted liberty to include him as an accused in the charge sheet if sufficient materials could be gathered against him

title: No action against KCR, Harish Rao till October 7 over Ghose Commission report: Telangana HC
content: The Advocate General said the government was bound to table action taken report in the Assembly, which would be done at a later stage

title: Sealdah Division plans new services to ease rush after East-West Kolkata Metro line launch
content: Passenger footfall rises sharply at Sealdah, Dum Dum following opening of the East-West Kolkata Metro line

title: India a ‘lighthouse of stability and growth’, says Ashwini Vaishnaw; invites global investors
content: Seventeen student teams have successfully designed and taped out chips, which were presented to Prime Minister Narendra Modi on September 2, 2025

title: GEIPL bank fraud case: ED searches 10 locations across Delhi and Maharashtra
content: The premises covered in the searches belong to the entities and persons closely associated with the promoters of GEIPL

title: India rain LIVE: Orange alert in Gurugram; Yamuna’s water level rises above danger mark
content: In Punjab, as many as 29 lives have been lost between August 1 and September 1 on account of rain-related incidents; more than three lakh acre agricultural land has been registered for crop damage claims

title: YouTuber journalist booked under extortion charge in U.P.'s Ballia
content: An FIR was lodged on September 1 at Rasra Police Station on the complaint of Dilip Kumar Gupta, a trader from Gudri Bazar in Rasra town

title: Low pressure area forms over northwest Bay of Bengal
content: The low pressure area has formed under the influence of an upper air cyclonic circulation over northeast Bay of Bengal and adjoining Myanmar coast

title: Puravankara bags Malabar Hill realty project in Mumbai with potential of ₹2,700 crore
content: The 1.43-acre project offers a development potential of 0.7 million square feet, providing new, premium homes for existing residents while also creating a substantial portion for sale

title: Presidential Reference hearing LIVE: No individual functions for President or Governor, can act in aid of the Council of Ministers, West Bengal tell SC
content: Powers of Governor, President is restricted by the options, procedure in Articles. 200 and 201, respectively. Neither Governor nor the President have any high plenary powers which oust even judicial review, Mr. Singhvi argues

title: Maratha quota stir: Nobody can stop Marathas from entering Mumbai, says Manoj Jarange
content: Earlier in the day, Mumbai Police issued a notice to Jarange and his team, asking them to vacate Azad Maidan at the earliest.

title: Yamuna water enters Delhi houses as river crosses danger mark; evacuation begins
content: The river received a discharge of 1.76 lakh cusecs from Hathni Kund Barrage, 69,210 cusec from Wazirabad Barrage, and 73,619 from Okhla Barrage

title: Justice B.V. Nagarathna: A dissent to safeguard the future
content: The dissent from the lone woman Supreme Court judge on the elevation of Justice Pancholi is multi-faceted. It did not merely focus on the point that there were other senior women High Court judges. Her reservations touched upon the criteria the Collegium had to consider while assessing a candidate for elevation

title: Farmers seek more compensation for crop damage by wild animals in Dharwad district of Karnataka
content: Labour minister and district-in-charge minister for Dharwad on Monday spent the entire day visiting affected villages in his constituency (Kalaghatagi) where crops have been damaged by wild animals and held ‘Jana Spandana’ grievances redressal meeting in Kalaghatagi town.

title: Mahesh Goud says Kavitha admitted corruption in Kaleshwaram
content: “Why are BRS leaders, who claim they have done no wrong, so afraid of a CBI probe? If they are innocent, they should face the investigation,” Mahesh Goud said

title: BJP seeks re-investigation into Soujanya rape-murder case in Dharmasthala
content: Karnataka High Court said in 2024 that no purpose will be served even if reinvestigation is permitted into the case

title: Madhya Pradesh CM Mohan Yadav launches Vedic clock, mobile app in Bhopal
content: Madhya Pradesh CM Mohan Yadav launches Vedic clock and app merging Hindu calendar with modern technology, emphasising Indian heritage

title: 2020 riots: Delhi High Court to pass order on bail pleas of Sharjeel Imam, Umar Khalid, others
content: The bail pleas by other co-accused, including Khalid Saifi, Gulfisha Fatima, have been pending in the High Court since 2022 and were heard by different Benches from time to time

title: Tripura Minister labels news media as an obstacle for Panchayat representatives
content: The Minister urged the Panchayat representatives to dedicate some time for the organisational activities of the BJP alongside their regular work

title: Army contingent departs for India-U.S. joint military exercise ‘Yudh Abhyas 2025’ in Alaska
content: The Indian contingent, comprising troops from a battalion of the Madras Regiment, will train alongside soldiers of the 1st Battalion, 5th Infantry Regiment “Bobcats”, part of the Arctic Wolves Brigade Combat Team of the U.S. Army’s 11th Airborne Division

title: Heavy rain lashes parts of Bhadradri Kothagudem district; 16 gates of Taliperu reservoir lifted
content: According to sources, a low-level causeway near Vagoddugudem village was flooded, cutting off road links to more than a dozen villages for several hours.

title: Rajasthan Assembly’s Monsoon Session starts with uproarious scenes
content: As soon as the House assembled, the Congress members started shouting slogans and displayed placards against vote theft allegations

title: J&K’s Kishtwar highly vulnerable to glacial lake bursts: report
content: Key public infrastructure including roads, schools and government buildings were at risk, the report highlighted; the district has the highest number of glacial lakes in the Union Territory.

title: Govt. launches ‘Adi Vaani’ to translate Adivasi languages
content: The government said that while the app is currently equipped to translate four languages – Gondi, Bhili, Mundari and Santali

title: Over 3 lakh acres of land hit by flood in Haryana; Faridabad on edge after release of excess water in Yamuna
content: Over 46,880 farmers in 1,003 villages have registered on the e-Kshatipurti portal for crop damage claims

title: Kochi sees significant surge in NDPS cases, seizures
content: Over 300 kg of ganja, nearly 3 kg of MDMA seized in eight months; drugs flow into city in large quantities

title: School in Kochi revises rules, to fine parents for late arrival of students
content: According to the revised rules, a child will no longer be punished or miss classes for arriving late. Instead, the onus has been placed on parents, who may now face a fine for bringing their wards late to schoo

title: ‘Millennium City’ ramps up civic response after outcry over crippling infrastructure
content: A two-day rain-induced deluge in July sparked public fury in Gurugram, prompting the city’s municipal corporation to launch a drive targeting waterlogging, waste management, and other civic issues

title: Immigration bureau set to check fraud, deport foreigners
content: The Rules to govern the Immigration and Foreigners Act, 2025, notified by the MHA on Monday (September 1, 2025), allow for recording biometric data of foreigners and mandate educational institutions to inform the BOI about foreign students. Clubs and resorts can be shut down if frequented by illegal migrants or foreigners with criminal record

title: Despite vacancies in government medical college hospitals in T.N., forensic doctors work at primary health centres
content: According to the doctors, over 70 posts of assistant professors and senior residents in forensic medicine remain vacant. Even after 20 in-service doctors joining after October, many posts will remain unfilled, they add

title: Train fare hike: a case of too little, too late
content: Railways needs big money for modernisation and progress; a fare increase was long overdue, but the tiny increase effective July 1 may not be the solution

title: Congress MP Sasikanth Senthil withdraws hunger strike temporarily
content: Congress top brass appealed to give up the hunger strike, Mr. Senthil says; he was protesting against the Centre over Samagra Shiksha Abhiyan funds for Tamil Nadu

title: Incessant rain and flood disrupt life in northern India
content: Punjab Governor to visit flood-affected districts from tomorrow; entire Himachal State declared as disaster hit; heavy rainfall warning issued for Haryana; precautionary measures ramped up in Chandigarh

title: Will accept Bihar SIR claims until last date of nominations: Election Commission of India
content: Earlier in the day in Supreme Court, the poll panel submitted it would accept revision forms even after the deadline, and these would be integrated into the final list

title: Amit Shah takes stock of rain-inflicted damage in Jammu and Kashmir, promises help
content: Home Minister calls for strengthening early warning systems to reduce the impact of natural calamities; teams from Ministry of Home Affairs and union territory administration should prioritise damage assessment and a meeting of relevant departments will be held soon, he says

title: DMK govt. trying to save Madurai Mayor in property tax scam, says Palaniswami
content: The AIADMK general secretary says without the Mayor’s instruction, the irregularities in the Corporation could not have happened

title: Maratha quota protest: Maharashtra government to act against ‘anti-social elements’
content: “We can’t say that law and order has collapsed. Within half an hour, police cleared the roads,” Chief Minister Devenra Fadnavis said.

title: New orchid recorded in Arunachal Pradesh
content: The Gastrochilus pechei has underlined the floral link between the State and Myanmar, the researchers said

title: Uttarakhand reserves 10% jobs for retired Agniveers in uniformed posts
content: The Cabinet had approved the proposal for reservation for Agniveers in State government jobs last month

title: Prime suspect in murder of 18-year-old arrested in Uttar Pradesh
content: Ishita Mallick was shot in her home in front of her family on the afternoon of August 25. While the details of the motive and the nature of the crime are still pending interrogation, the police said that a relationship feud may have been one of the possible motives

title: Nagaland University to develop grammar for 18 Naga languages
content: Naga tongues have been taught in schools for decades, but none have a dedicated written grammar for the teaching-learning process

title: Supreme Court seeks response to transgender-inclusive sex education plea
content: The petition seeks the formal integration of age-appropriate, transgender-inclusive comprehensive sexuality education (CSE) into school curricula nationwide

title: Supreme Court issues notice to Centre after T.N. says Samagra Shiksha funds delinked from RTE reimbursements
content: Tamil Nadu submitted that the Centre and State had concurrent responsibility to fund the education of poor and disadvantaged children under Section 7 of the RTE Act, 2009

title: Can minority-run schools be exempted from RTE law, SC refers question to larger Bench
content: A Constitution Bench, in 2014, held that the RTE law violated the minority character of these institutions and took the institutions entirely out of the ambit of the law. On Monday, Justice Datta observed that the 2014 judgment has ‘unknowingly jeopardised the very foundation of universal elementary education’

title: Giants recall Teng to face Rockies
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the nationals are slated to call up Andrew Alvarez to start against the marlins . alvarez posted a 3.95 ERA and 1.35 WHIP as a 2nd .

title: Week 1 takeaways: What happened to Arch Manning? Is Utah the Big 12 team to beat?
content: our college football experts break down key takeaways from week 1 performances . the college football playoff selection committee will continue to use schedule strength to evaluate teams . if they do, that could be a problem for Alabama, Texas and Clemson .

title: Son's LAFC arrival brings out pride in L.A.'s Korean community
content: Son Heung-Min welcomes son to your new home . despite a tense 2-1 loss to San Diego FC, the result felt secondary to the raucous festivities . the south Korean forward represents much more than just a player on the pitch .

title: 'No days off': Inside the pillars of Patriots' Mike Vrabel's hands-on coaching style
content: a former linebacker who became a head coach emerged with a bloody cut on his cheek . he was hired as the 16th head coach in the Patriots history in january . the former nfl player was tangled up with an defender on the ground during a practice .

title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid, Barcelona eye Guéhi after Liverpool deal fails
content: real madrid and barcelona are interested in signing marc Guéhi . aston villa goalkeeper Emiliano Martnez doesn't want to move to Turkey . the reds had agreed a £35m deal with the Eagles but manager Oliver Glasner insists his captain shouldn't leave .

title: Only in college football: Week 1's best non-statistical superlatives
content: the legendary Lee Corso picks Ohio State to win in his final "College GameDay" opening weekend always delivers a little bit of everything that makes fans say, "Only in college football" a mascot lost its head (literally) and a storybook tribute was delivered .

title: Weekly pickups: Lacan finishing the season strong
content: the longest regular season in WNBA history concludes next week . there is value in identifying strong finishers around the league . a rising rookie featured in the backcourt section below could be a top fantasy force .

title: Rating the new attacking signings, including Sesko, Pedro, Gyokeres and others
content: it has been a record-breaking transfer window in the premier league . the transfer window has been shut down for two weeks for the first internatio . it's a mixed start for the new signings . click here for all the latest transfer news .

title: Bolts' Harris cleared for contact, expects to play
content: new: "it's probably my fifth day at practice," he says . new: he expects to play in the Chargers' season opener against the Kansas City Chiefs . he missed all of training camp because of an eye injury he sustained in a fireworks mishap . "there's a possibility," says a coach .

title: College football Power Rankings: First impressions of each Top 25 team
content: first impressions can be deceiving -- shoutout to Kenny Trill and a magical night in 2014 -- but they also provide much-yearned-for context to the power rankings . some could be a harbinger for big things ahead, like Florida State steamrolling Alabama following a 2-10 season in 2024 .
